title: Ticket #5744: Universe names need updating in condor_q output
description:
When running 'condor_q -help universe' using 8.4.6, I noticed that the job universe names need updating: 

    JobUniverse codes:
	 1 Standard
	 4 PVM
	 5 Vanilla
	 6 PVMD
	 7 Scheduler
	 8 MPI
	 9 Globus
	10 Java
	11 Parallel
	12 Local
	13 VM

Globus should probably be renamed to Grid, or at the very least read 'Grid, Globus' or something along those lines. Vanilla universe should also include Docker as a label.
creator: blin
